Package org.bukkit.inventory

Class FurnaceRecipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.inventory.FurnaceRecipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recipe

    public class FurnaceRecipe
extends Object
implements Recipe
    Represents a smelting recipe.
